A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hugely disappointing. Subverts all expectations set up by The Force Awakens in the worst possible ways. Poorly developed characters. Pointless subplots. Incomprehensible character motivations. This film treats classic characters from the original trilogy with no respect whatsoever. This waste of time is a great example of how NOT to make a film. Visuals are pretty\, though.
